Furious Dancing on Ice fans were outraged on Sunday night, slamming the judges over a skate off 'travesty.'
Musicals Week proved to be one to remember with things neck and neck on the leaderboard as… [+1934 chars]

articles.author: Sam Elliott
articles.title: Joe Swash not talking to Stacey Solomon because he thinks she's secretly The Sausage - Mirror Online
articles.description: Many think Stacey Solomon is inside The Masked Singer's Sausage after various clues and Joe Swash is now giving his fiancée the silent treatment because she hasn't told him as the rumours swirl
articles.content:
Joe Swash and Stacey Solomon aren't talking because he is convinced she is The Sausage and refuses to tell him. 
 The former X Factor star is one of the names to constantly be thrown up on The Maske… [+2057 chars]
